item.description:
Hi all,

Lets plan to meet up from 1 onwards. You can drive and park there or get the T to Central square on the red line and walk about 10 minutes or you can get the green B line to Boston University West and walk over the BU bridge and to the park on the left as you cross the bridge.

There is a Trader Joes across the road which could be a good place to grab some picnic foods/ drinks. If you want to bring a BBQ then please go ahead. I don't have one and noone has told me they are bringing one so I'll just do a picnic from Trader Joes.

If you choose to drink (ofcourse) then we just need to be a bit discrete about it. Plastic cups, drinks in eskys, we should be ok.

Who has a cricket set?
Who has a football?
anyone got an Esky or two they can bring?
PLease let me know what you can bring...

Come along, bring your friends, it will be a fun day kicking back in the park. See you on Saturday.

I'll email my cell phone number to those who RSVP byFriday.

Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Australia Day in July
